sections.name: Starters
sections.description: Have a little something while you wait.

items.title: Soup of the Day
items.description: Please ask your server for the soup of the day.

items.title: Beef Carpaccio
items.description: Wafer thin slices of cured beef, with garnish.

items.title: Rack of Lamb
items.description: Trimmed rack of lamb, served medium with a selection of potatoes and vegetables.

items.title: Fillet of Salmon
items.description: Fillet of Atlantic salmon, baked and served with home-made Hollandaise and asparagus.
